title: Drawing, Project for the elevation of the frame of a receptacle for a monstrance, 1825–50
title_raw: Project for the elevation of the frame of a receptacle for a monstrance
medium: pencil, pen, ink, black watercolor wash, paper
markings: Watermark: bottom half of a bird standing on one foot on a triple mount in circle
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Two angels, standing on clouds, raise with their hands a palm and a vine bow, respectively. They lean with their inside arms on a circular frame. On top and at the bottom of the frame are clouds with cherubim.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Project for the elevation of the frame of a receptacle for a monstrance, 1825–50. pencil, pen, ink, black watercolor wash, paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6107.
